system.description:
Leadership encompasses your capability to inspire, command, and coordinate groups. It is essential for rallying villagers, organizing defenses, or persuading others to follow your guidance.

You make a Leadership test when attempting to motivate a group, establish authority, or coordinate actions during a crisis. If multiple people are working towards the same goal, you can transfer your successes to others, improving their chances of success.

Extra Successes Can Be Used To:

  • Rally Troops – Boost the morale of a group, giving them a temporary advantage.
  • Coordinate Actions – Improve the effectiveness of group efforts by organizing their actions.
  • Persuade Followers – Convince others to follow your lead, even in dangerous situations.
  • Establish Authority – Command respect and obedience from those around you.
  • Inspire Confidence – Instill a sense of confidence and determination in your allies.
